name: RPG Horror Game
description:
ALT + ENTER TO GO FULLSCREEN :D

This is a work in progress, so it's a short demo so you can see what to expect :D

Don't know when I will finsih this game but it will come this year. :)

Also you are free to give me some ideas. :D

Btw, this was made in about an hour, so don't expect anything long.
